_description: ‘I loue none but you alone’ — five cross-rhymed quatrains

BLRoyApp58.First Lines:
The lytyll prety nyghtyn galeamong the leuys fayre and
                        grene
grene I wolde I wereI were wyth hure all nyghtbut yet ye
                    wote not whome I mene…
BLRoyApp58.Last Lines:
…lady I cryed wyth rufull monehaue mynd of me that true hath
                    benefor I loue none but you aloneBut yet ye wot not whome I
                    mene
